title: Questions regarding the legacy and beta client
body:
Will the legacy client be available to players forever? I recently upgraded to the beta client and absolutely love the new client design and the practice tool feature, but it is extremely laggy. Every time I find a match the transition between accepting and getting into champion select is so ridiculously long (a whole minute), making me leave queue due to not banning a champion. Now I'm currently going back to the legacy client and hope that I can use it until the lag issues associated with the beta client are resolved.

Please work on a solution Riot Games!
Cheers,
lmperius
A happy fan

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you tried disabling animations in the client, this may improve your experience.
